title: 2025 BIGGEST AGRICULTURE DRONE TRAILER | nuWay AG

tasks.task: Release and operate an agricultural drone trailer.
subtasks: Welding the flight deck for the drone.
Ensuring the trailer is capable of covering acres efficiently.
Installing DJI generators and charge boxes.
Configuring power systems for drone operation.
Managing water and chemical mixing tanks.
Building a strong flight deck with Amish craftsmanship.
Creating a solid floor on the top deck.
Installing railing and shaded areas for comfort.
Designing a charging system for drone batteries.

tasks.task: Operate the DJI T40 drone from the trailer.
subtasks: Charging the DJI T40 drone's batteries.
Using the charging stations during operations.
Accessing controllers and other equipment on the deck.
Managing water supply for the drone.
Mixing chemicals in the induction tank.
